text:
@priyankac19 Madam, aap ab Mumbai main rehti hain-the Covid hotspot of India, where hospital bed dashboard not yet ready; Covid+ patients asked to get lost by non-Covid hosp & Covid beds all full; helpline not working as 50% staff sick; migrants running away in fear 

https://t.co/iSVB7Fj4IK
